FAQS.title-1: Why Should I use Global Link Plus?
FAQS.content-1-a: Global Link ERP system is the ultimate resource for businesses seeking comprehensive and evolving solutions to achieve growth and success. Our platform offers a vast array of resources, including an AI library, file management, purchasing tools, and logistics management, just to name a few. We are committed to continuous improvement and constantly adding new features and tools that will transform your company into a powerhouse at any level.
FAQS.content-1-b: Our mission is to empower businesses with the tools and resources they need to thrive in today's competitive marketplace. Join us and experience the transformative power of our ERP system. Choose our platform for comprehensive and evolving solutions that will take your business to new height
FAQS.title-2: How easy is the software to use?
FAQS.content-2-a: The ease of this software uses an in-depth interactive tutorial that provides help to the users to learn how to use the system effectively. This tutorial covers all aspects of the system and includes three forms of learning - written instructions, video demonstrations, and user interaction - to cater to different learning styles.
FAQS.content-2-b: Global Link Plus offers tools that can be used to automate tasks, analyze data, and provide valuable insights that enhance the overall business experience. By seamlessly integrating with these AI tools, the file management system can help businesses streamline their operations and make data-driven decisions. With its user-friendly interface, comprehensive learning resources, and AI integration capabilities, this system is a must-have for any modern business.
FAQS.title-3: What are some unique features of the software?
FAQS.content-3: The software's modular structure, which links all of the modules together to deliver real-time and accurate data for your business, is one of its distinctive features. Adapting the UI to the preferences of each user is another distinctive characteristic that makes it more user-friendly.  Also, the software provides up-to-date forecasts based on all firm channels, which gives businesses a benefit when planning and making decisions. Another distinctive characteristic that makes it simpler for clients to browse and buy items is the ability to provide goods and services in a catalog format on a website. Businesses can use the program to manage all purchases and sales in a single, simple, real-time format. The incorporation of AI tools to improve organizational performance and efficiency is another distinctive trait. The program creates a handy single-point source for all business needs by centralizing all corporate data in one location that is accessible from anywhere in the world.
FAQS.title-4: How does Global Link Plus use AI?
FAQS.content-4-q1: A. How does Global Link Plus use AI internally?
FAQS.content-4-a1: Global Link Plus uses AI internally with data to assist each user in getting the best experience and most accurate data and performance.
FAQS.content-4-q2: B. How does Global Link Plus link outside AI sources to their system?
FAQS.content-4-a2: Global Link Plus links outside AI sources to their system to create the best user experience.
FAQS.content-4-q3: C. What is the purpose of AI in Global Link Plus?
FAQS.content-4-a3: The purpose of AI in Global Link Plus is to increase productivity and efficiency for each company.

about1.para-1: A US-based provider of cloud-based ERP software in Salt Lake City, Utah. It enables  the connection of CRM (customer relationship management software) with programs  for e-commerce, customer service, marketing automation, analytics, and application  development.
about1.para-1-list-1: One language is used by businesses worldwide for your entire organization.
about1.para-1-list-2: Decisions are made faster with software that grows with you, eliminating the cost of maintenance and IT improvement.
about1.para-2: ERP software may have features for order management, project management, logistics, product lifecycle management, enterprise performance management (EPM), human resources/human capital management, supply chain management, inventory, manufacturing, and maintenance.
about1.para-3: Furthermore, cloud-based ERP solutions frequently incorporate cutting-edge  technologies like the internet of things (IoT), blockchain, artificial intelligence (AI),  machine learning, and personal digital assistants.
about1.para-4: Global Link Plus works for both small and big businesses.  Our goal is to offer a variety of user-friendly business applications that come as a  whole toolkit to support any business need. We have the infrastructure to provide  millions of businesses around the world with simple access to the tools they require to  operate and grow their operations.

about2.title: What distinguishes GLP?
about2.para-1: A streamlined and welcoming user experience has been created to guarantee user uptake.  Even the needs of the most complex businesses are met by fluidity and complete  integration. Simple software and apps can enhance productivity and lower costs to help  your business thrive thanks to Global Link's versatility.
about2.para-2: Global Link Plus is actively updated by a sizable group of developers in order to satisfy  changing client needs and offer fresh, cutting-edge applications because of the open-  source community for the global link creator.

about3.title: Integrate with GLP
about3.para-1: GLP is designed to integrate with other systems and operate in concert with them to provide a complete business solution. Therefore you establish a connection with each client.
about3.list-1: Instant business insights for immediate action. High scalability.
about3.list-2: Offers APIs and services for improved integration.
about3.list-3: Visualization of activity dashboard using graphs and charts.
about3.list-5: Extremely secure servers guaranteeing data integrity.
about3.list-6: Little need for expensive upgrades and additional IT support.
about3.list-7: It is highly flexible, works with all mobile devices, including tabs, and is multilingual for maximum reach.
about3.list-8: It allows outstanding cooperation between business units.
about3.list-9: It allows a high level of automation of workflows.
about3.list-10: It uses the integration of AI systems to boost productivity.
about3.list-11: Data Analytics: With its built-in data analytics package, it can give organizations useful information they can use. Also, it can manage a huge volume of multi-dimensional data, which enables you to view the outcomes in a variety of ways.

channels.channels-text: The Channels modular will allow you to add new connections of either API, EDI, or manual. Once set up these will populate under all Product Channel dropdowns as well as push API and EDI orders to your Sales modular.

channels-forms.channel-info-text: API when linked is in pending status and can take up to 48 business hours before link is complete

channels-forms.edit-channel-info: You cannot edit the Master and Webstore channels at the moment. Webstore channel is created automatically when you create a new webstore.

support.support-search: Search our knowledge base for assistance

recent-articles-sections.recent-articles-1: How do I add a product?
recent-articles-sections.recent-articles-1-text: There are 2 steps to adding a product. 1. Bulk Upload your products all at once 2. Add individual products.
recent-articles-sections.recent-articles-2-text: Links is a function that is coming soon, that will give you a full directory of business related AI software tools.
recent-articles-sections.recent-articles-3-text: Global Files is a internal file management system that organizes data, images, videos, and documentation in an easy simplistic manner.
recent-articles-sections.recent-articles-4-text: API requests are submitted through an API ticket method which will result in our API team reaching out for connection details.
recent-articles-sections.recent-articles-5-text: We recommend all users start by creating your partners, customers, categories and product addition. Although you are free to start wherever.
recent-articles-sections.recent-articles-6: Can I process orders on the system?
recent-articles-sections.recent-articles-6-text: We have 3 different methods that you may use to process orders. 1. API integration 2. EDI integration 3. Manual Entry.

submit-tickets.submit-ticket-text: Have you ran into a bug, error, or any problem, don't hesitate to submit a ticket. We're here to help! Your input is crucial in resolving issues promptly and improving our services. Rest assured, our team will review and address your ticket as quickly as possible. Thank you for your cooperation.
submit-tickets.max-file6: Maximum files is 6 at a time

give-feedback-form.give-feedback-text: At Global Link+, we deeply value your feedback, as it helps us improve and deliver exceptional services.Together, we are building a stronger and more connected future, and your feedback is an essential part of that journey. Thank you for being an essential part of the Global Link+ family!

preferences.metric-system-text: Which metric system suits you: the versatile, globally embraced metric system with its logical units like meters and grams, or the imperial metric system, used in some regions, featuring feet, pounds, and gallons? Which do you prefer for measurements: simplicity and universality or familiarity and tradition?
preferences.currency-text: Customize your software experience by selecting your preferred currency value. Tailoring to your region or preference ensures accurate transactions and a seamless financial interface within the software.
preferences.language-text: Customize your software experience by selecting your preferred language value. Tailoring to your region or preference ensures seamless experience within the software.
preferences.idle-text: Mobile fingerprint scanners offer secure, convenient access, enhancing device security and user authentication. Their portable nature enables seamless integration across devices, safeguarding sensitive information with biometric precision.
preferences.2fa-text: 2-Factor Authentication fortifies security by requiring two verification steps, bolstering protection against unauthorized access. It ensures an additional layer of defense, safeguarding sensitive data and user accounts effectively.
preferences.email-conn-text: Below confirms if your email is connected for 2-Factor Authentication.
preferences.phone-conn-text: Below confirms if your phone is connected for 2-Factor Authentication.
preferences.change-password-text: Regularly changing passwords bolsters security, preventing unauthorized access to accounts. Updating passwords routinely safeguards sensitive information, reducing the risk of data breaches and ensuring ongoing account protection.
preferences.notifications-text: Regularly changing passwords bolsters security, preventing unauthorized access to accounts. Updating passwords routinely safeguards sensitive information, reducing the risk of data breaches and ensuring ongoing account protection.
preferences.dark-mode-text: Regularly changing passwords bolsters security, preventing unauthorized access to accounts. Updating passwords routinely safeguards sensitive information, reducing the risk of data breaches and ensuring ongoing account protection.
preferences.policy-text: App notifications keep you informed and engaged with timely updates, alerts, and personalized messages. They enhance user experience, providing convenience and ensuring you stay connected effortlessly.
preferences.terms-text: App notifications keep you informed and engaged with timely updates, alerts, and personalized messages. They enhance user experience, providing convenience and ensuring you stay connected effortlessly.

accounting.glp-fee-text: Your contract includes a 3% charge on all completed purchase orders

purchasing.create-po-text: Below is a directory of tools that can greatly help your company. This list will be constantly updated with the latest and greatest free and paid software's on the internet. These software's can take your business to the next level.
purchasing.po-status-text: The PO Status feature provides users with comprehensive visibility into their purchase orders, including their current status in three key stages: On Order, In Production, and En Route. Additionally, users can access valuable information such as the overall and individual sections' respective values and cube measurements.
purchasing.po-history-text: The PO Status feature provides users with comprehensive visibility into their purchase orders, including their current status in three key stages: On Order, In Production, and En Route. details.industry-template-text: Industry template helps populate the proper data that is needed when creating a product that fits your companies industry. You can make this your default template by selecting your template in the preference page or by clicking the default button below. If you do not want this pop-up to appear every time a manual product is added select the box do not show again. This can also be reinstated within your preference page.
